meanings.definition: Having or showing excessive confidence or self-assurance.
meanings.sent1: She felt superconfident about her presentation after practicing many times.
meanings.sent2: He always appears superconfident when speaking in public.
meanings.sent3: Despite being superconfident, she still gets nervous before big events.
meanings.sent4: His superconfident attitude was like a shield against any criticism.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's superconfident demeanor inspired everyone around him.

meanings.definition: To be extremely confident in one's abilities or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: They superconfidently tackled the challenging project and succeeded.
meanings.sent2: She superconfidently asserted her opinion during the debate.
meanings.sent3: He superconfidently declared he could eat the entire pizza by himself.
meanings.sent4: The team superconfidently marched into the competition, ready to win.
meanings.sent5: The explorer superconfidently ventured into the unknown territory.
